glyphs.name: Glyph of Die by the Sword

spell.name: Juggernaut
spell.description: You can Charge every 12 sec instead of every 20 sec.

spell.name: Double Time
spell.description: You can use Charge twice in a row, but it can only grant Rage once every 12 sec. Each use has a 20 sec recharge time.

spell.name: Warbringer
spell.description: Your Charge now stuns its target for 1.50 sec instead of rooting it.

spell.name: Enraged Regeneration
spell.description: Instantly heals you for 10% of your maximum health, and an additional 20% over 5 sec. Usable while stunned.

spell.name: Second Wind
spell.description: Whenever you are below 35% health, you gain 10% leech, healing yourself for a percentage of damage you deal.

spell.name: Impending Victory
spell.description:
Instantly attack the target, causing 6,016 damage and healing you for 15% of your maximum health.



Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory.



Replaces Victory Rush.

spell.name: Heavy Repercussions
spell.description: Shield Slam deals 30% additional damage while Shield Block or Shield Charge is active.

spell.name: Furious Strikes
spell.description: Wild Strike costs 25 less Rage.

spell.name: Taste for Blood
spell.description: Each time Rend deals damage, you gain 3 Rage.

spell.name: Sudden Death
spell.description: Your autoattack hits have a 10% chance to make your next Execute cost no initial Rage and be usable on any target, regardless of health level.

spell.name: Unquenchable Thirst
spell.description: Bloodthirst no longer has a cooldown.

spell.name: Unyielding Strikes
spell.description: Devastate reduces the Rage cost of Heroic Strike by 5 for 5 sec, stacking up to 6 times.  Once this effect reaches 6 applications, its duration will no longer refresh.

spell.name: Slam
spell.description: Slam an opponent, causing 4,721 Physical damage. Each consecutive use of Slam increases the damage dealt by 50% and the Rage cost by 100%, stacking up to 2 times for 2 sec.

spell.name: Storm Bolt
spell.description: Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 1,887 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.  Deals quadruple damage to targets permanently immune to stuns.

spell.name: Shockwave
spell.description: Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 3,759 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 4 sec.  Cooldown reduced by 20 sec if it strikes at least 3 targets.

spell.name: Dragon Roar
spell.description: Roar explosively, dealing 4,962 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and knocking them back and down for 0.50 sec. Damage ignores all armor and is always a critical strike.

spell.name: Mass Spell Reflection
spell.description:
Reflects the next spell cast on you and on all party and raid members within 20 yards for 5 sec.



Replaces Spell Reflection.

spell.name: Safeguard
spell.description:
Run at high speed toward a party or raid member, intercepting the next melee or ranged attack made against them, reducing damage taken by them by 20% for 6 sec.



Replaces Intervene.

spell.name: Vigilance
spell.description: Protect a party or raid member for 12 sec, reducing damage they take by 30% and allowing you to use Taunt with no cooldown.

spell.name: Avatar
spell.description: Transform into a colossus for 24 sec, dealing 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

spell.name: Bloodbath
spell.description: For the next 12 sec, your melee damage abilities and their multistrikes deal 30% additional  damage as a bleed over 6 sec. While bleeding, targets move 50% slower.

spell.name: Bladestorm
spell.description: Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all targets within 8 yards for 5,033 Physical damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.  You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can only use Taunt and other defensive abilities.

spell.name: Anger Management
spell.description:
Every 30 rage that you spend reduces the remaining cooldown of several of your abilities by 1 sec:



Avatar

Bloodbath

Bladestorm

Storm Bolt

Shockwave

Dragon Roar

Mocking Banner

Heroic Leap

Recklessness

Die by the Sword

spell.name: Ravager
spell.description: Throw a whirling axe at the target location that inflicts 2,482 damage to enemies within 6 yards every 1 sec. Lasts 10 sec.

spell.name: Gladiator's Resolve
spell.description:
Increases the damage reduction provided by Defensive Stance by 5%.



Also allows you to forgo your defensive role, and instead focus only on offensive capabilities, by replacing Battle Stance with Gladiator Stance.



 Gladiator Stance

A dauntless combat stance.



Increases physical damage dealt by 20%, and replaces your Shield Block with Shield Charge.



You cannot change into or out of this stance during combat.

spell.name: Siegebreaker
spell.description:
Use your full strength to slam the target with your weapon, dealing 9,437 damage, and knocking them back and down for 1 sec.



Replaces Intimidating Shout.

spell.name: Siegebreaker
spell.description:
Use your full strength to slam the target with your weapon, dealing 9,437 damage, and knocking them back and down for 1 sec.



Replaces Intimidating Shout.

specs.name: Arms
specs.description: A battle-hardened master of two-handed weapons, using mobility and overpowering attacks to strike his opponents down.

specs.name: Fury
specs.description: A furious berserker wielding a weapon in each hand, unleashing a flurry of attacks to carve his opponents to pieces.

specs.name: Protection
specs.description: A stalwart protector who uses a shield to safeguard herself and her allies.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Fire From the Heavens
Glyph of Protector of the Innocent

spell.name: Speed of Light
spell.description: Increases your movement speed by 70% for 8 sec.

spell.name: Long Arm of the Law
spell.description: Successful Judgments increase your movement speed by 45% for 3 sec.

spell.name: Pursuit of Justice
spell.description: Increases your movement speed by 15%, plus an additional 5% for each charge of Holy Power up to 3.

spell.name: Fist of Justice
spell.description:
Stuns the target for 6 sec.



Replaces Hammer of Justice.

spell.name: Repentance
spell.description: Meditation incapacitates the enemy target for 1 min. Any damage other than Censure will awaken the target.  Usable against Demons, Dragonkin, Giants, Humanoids, and Undead.

spell.name: Blinding Light
spell.description: Emits a dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yards, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec.

spell.name: Selfless Healer
spell.description: Your successful Judgments reduce the cast time and mana cost of your next Flash of Light by 35%, and increase its effect on others by 20%. Stacks up to 3 times.

spell.name: Eternal Flame
spell.description:
Consumes up to 3 Holy Power to heal an ally for up to 9,133 and an additional 346 every 1.92 sec for up to 30 sec.  Healing over time increased by 50% when cast on self.



Replaces Word of Glory.

spell.name: Sacred Shield
spell.description: Protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 30 sec, absorbing up to 4,460 damage every 5.75 sec.  Only one target can be affected at a time.

spell.name: Sacred Shield
spell.description:
Protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 30 sec. The shield absorbs up to 3,397 damage every 5.75 sec.



Max 3 charges.

spell.name: Sacred Shield
spell.description: Protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 30 sec, absorbing up to 4,460 damage every 5.75 sec.  Only one target can be affected at a time.

spell.name: Hand of Purity
spell.description: Places a Hand on the friendly target, reducing damage taken by 10% and damage over time by an additional 80% for 6 sec. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.

spell.name: Unbreakable Spirit
spell.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection and Lay on Hands by 50%.

spell.name: Clemency
spell.description: Your Hand abilities all now have 2 charges.

spell.name: Holy Avenger
spell.description: Abilities that generate Holy Power will deal 30% additional damage and healing, and generate 3 charges of Holy Power for the next 18 sec.

spell.name: Sanctified Wrath
spell.description: Avenging Wrath lasts 50% longer and grants more frequent access to one of your abilities while it lasts.

spell.name: Sanctified Wrath
spell.description: Your Holy Wrath now generates 1 Holy Power, and deals 100% additional damage.

spell.name: Divine Purpose
spell.description: Word of Glory has a 25% chance to cause your next Word of Glory or Templar's Verdict or Divine Storm to consume no Holy Power but cast as if 3 were consumed.

spell.name: Holy Prism
spell.description:
A beam of light turns the target into a Holy Prism.



An enemy target takes 10,356 Holy damage and radiates 10,356 healing to 5 nearby allies within 15 yards.



A friendly target is healed for 13,806 and radiates 7,766 Holy damage to 5 nearby enemies within 15 yards.

spell.name: Light's Hammer
spell.description: Hurls a Light-infused hammer into the ground, where it blasts a 10 yard radius every 2 sec for 14 sec. Each blast deals 2,970 Holy damage to enemies, reduces enemy movement speed by 50% for 2 sec, and heals up to 6 allies for 2,312.

spell.name: Execution Sentence
spell.description:
A hammer slowly falls from the sky, causing 31,219 Holy damage over 10 sec. Damage increases over time, culminating in a final burst. Dispelling the effect triggers the final burst.



Stay of Execution

On a friendly target, the falling hammer heals for 23,023 over 10 sec. This healing is a large burst at first, and then decreases over time.

spell.name: Empowered Seals
spell.description:
Your Seals also cause your Judgment to empower you with an additional beneficial effect which persists through changing Seals:



Judgment of Insight

Heals you for 1% of your maximum health every 2 sec for 20 sec.



Judgment of Righteousness

Increases your haste by 15% for 20 sec.



Judgment of Truth

Increases your attack power by 15% for 20 sec.

spell.name: Beacon of Faith
spell.description:
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light.



 Beacon of Light

Your heals, including multistrikes, on other party or raid members will also heal the Beacon of Light target for up to 50% of the amount healed. Your Flash of Light and Holy Light on the Beacon of Light target will also refund 40% of their Mana cost.

spell.name: Seraphim
spell.description: The Light temporarily magnifies your power, increasing your Haste, Critical Strike, Mastery, Multistrike, Versatility, and Bonus Armor by 1,000 for 15 sec.

spell.name: Beacon of Insight
spell.description: Places a beacon of insight on an ally, increasing their healing received from your next direct single-target heal, or Holy Radiance, within 1 min by 30%. When consumed, or when the target reaches full health, it moves to the most injured ally within 40 yards. Limit 1.

spell.name: Holy Shield
spell.description: Increases your block chance by 15%, and allows you to block spells. Additionally, when you block, you deal 2,257 Holy damage to your attacker.

spell.name: Final Verdict
spell.description:
Empowers your weapon with holy energy, and performs a devastating strike, dealing 6,291 Holy damage.



Also increases the damage and radius of your next Divine Storm by 100%.



Replaces Templar's Verdict.

spell.name: Saved by the Light
spell.description:
When you or your Beacon of Light target drop below 30% health, you instantly grant the injured target a protective shield, absorbing up to 30% of their maximum health for 10 sec.



You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.

specs.name: Holy
specs.description: Invokes the power of the Light to protect and to heal.

specs.name: Protection
specs.description: Uses Holy magic to shield himself and defend allies from attackers.

specs.name: Retribution
specs.description: A righteous crusader who judges and punishes opponents with weapons and Holy magic.

petSpecs.name: Ferocity
petSpecs.description: Driven by a frenzied persistence to pursue prey, these beasts stop at nothing to achieve victory; even death is temporary for these predators.

petSpecs.name: Ferocious Adaptation
petSpecs.description: Driven by a rabid persistence to pursue prey, these carnivorous beasts stop at nothing to achieve victory; even death is temporary for these predators.

petSpecs.name: Tenacity
petSpecs.description: Stalwart and veteran defenders who unquestionably place their thick hides and protective exteriors in harm's way for their allies.

petSpecs.name: Tenacious Adaptation
petSpecs.description: Stalwart and veteran defenders who unquestionably place their thick hides and protective exteriors in harm's way for their allies.

petSpecs.name: Cunning Adaptation
petSpecs.description: Guileful creatures capable of skillfully mitigating lethal blows dealt to themselves and their allies.

petSpecs.name: Cunning
petSpecs.description: Guileful creatures capable of skillfully mitigating lethal blows dealt to themselves and their allies.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Aspect of the Pack
Glyph of Aspect of the Cheetah
Glyph of Aspect of the Beast

spell.name: Posthaste
spell.description: Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.

spell.name: Narrow Escape
spell.description: Disengage also activates a web trap which immobilizes all targets within 8 yards for 8 sec.

spell.name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Chimaera
spell.description: Reduces the cooldown of Disengage by 10 sec, and the cooldown of Deterrence by 60 sec.

spell.name: Binding Shot
spell.description: Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yards for 10 sec, stunning them for 5 sec if they move more than 5 yards from the arrow.

spell.name: Wyvern Sting
spell.description:
A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep, incapacitating them for 30 sec.  Any damage will cancel the effect.



Usable while moving.

spell.name: Intimidation
spell.description: Command your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 3 sec.

spell.name: Exhilaration
spell.description: Instantly heals you for 22% and your pet for 100% of max health.

spell.name: Iron Hawk
spell.description: Reduces all damage taken by 10%.

spell.name: Spirit Bond
spell.description: While your pet is active, you and your pet will regenerate 2% of total health every 2 sec.

spell.name: Steady Focus
spell.description: Using Steady Shot twice in a row increases your Focus Regeneration by 50% for 10 sec.

spell.name: Dire Beast
spell.description: Summons a powerful wild beast to attack your target for 15 sec. Each time the beast deals damage, you will gain 2 Focus.

spell.name: Thrill of the Hunt
spell.description:
You have a 6% chance per 10 Focus spent on Focus-costing attacks to trigger Thrill of the Hunt.



Thrill of the Hunt reduces the Focus cost of your next 3 Arcane Shots, Aimed Shots, or Multi-Shots by 20.

spell.name: A Murder of Crows
spell.description: Summons a flock of crows to attack your target over the next 15 sec. If the target dies while under attack, A Murder of Crows' cooldown is reset.

spell.name: Blink Strikes
spell.description: Your pet's Basic Attacks deal 50% increased damage, can now be used from 30 yards away, and will instantly teleport them behind their target.

spell.name: Stampede
spell.description: Summons all of your pets to fight your current target for 20 sec. While in an Arena or Battleground, these pets deal only 25% of their normal damage.

spell.name: Glaive Toss
spell.description:
You hurl two glaives toward a target, each dealing 1,250 damage to each enemy struck and reducing movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.  The primary target will take 4 times as much damage from each strike.



The Glaives will return back to you, damaging and snaring targets again as they return.

spell.name: Powershot
spell.description: A powerful shot which deals 15,834 Physical damage to the target and 17,813 Physical damage to all enemies between you and the target.  All enemies hit are knocked back.

spell.name: Barrage
spell.description: Rapidly fires a spray of shots for 2.88 sec, dealing 23,932 Physical damage to the enemy target and an average of 11,966 Physical damage to each other enemy target in front of you.  Usable while moving.

spell.name: Exotic Munitions
spell.description:
Allows you to modify your ranged weapon to use exotic munitions:



Incendiary Ammo

Arms your ranged weapon with exotic ammunition that lasts for 1 hour. Each autoshot deals 723 additional Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yards of the initial target.



Poisoned Ammo

Arms your ranged weapon with exotic ammunition that lasts for 1 hour. Each autoshot deals 1,104 additional Nature damage over 16 sec. When this effect is refreshed, the remaining damage will be added to the new effect.



Frozen Ammo

Arms your ranged weapon with exotic ammunition that lasts for 1 hour. Each autoshot deals 535 additional Frost damage and reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.



Only one exotic munition can be active at one time.

spell.name: Focusing Shot
spell.description:
Carefully line up a shot at the target that deals 4,222 Physical damage and focuses you, generating 50 Focus.



Cannot be cast while moving.



Replaces Steady Shot and Cobra Shot.

spell.name: Focusing Shot
spell.description:
Carefully line up a shot at the target that deals 4,222 Physical damage and focuses you, generating 50 Focus.



Cannot be cast while moving.



Replaces Steady Shot and Cobra Shot.

spell.name: Focusing Shot
spell.description:
Carefully line up a shot at the target that deals 4,222 Physical damage and focuses you, generating 50 Focus.



Cannot be cast while moving.



Replaces Steady Shot and Cobra Shot.

spell.name: Focusing Shot
spell.description:
Carefully line up a shot at the target that deals 4,222 Physical damage and focuses you, generating 50 Focus.



Cannot be cast while moving.



Replaces Steady Shot and Cobra Shot.

spell.name: Lone Wolf
spell.description: While you don't have a pet active, your damage dealt with Auto Shot, Arcane Shot, Cobra Shot, Black Arrow, and Explosive Shot is increased by 30% and you are able to provide one of several beneficial effects to your party and raid.

spell.name: Adaptation
spell.description:
Increases the effect of your pet's Combat Experience to 85% increased damage. Your pet now gains the following abilities, regardless of its active spec:



Spiked Collar

Roar of Sacrifice

Cornered

Boar's Speed

Last Stand

Blood of the Rhino

Great Stamina

specs.name: Beast Mastery
specs.description: A master of the wild who can tame a wide variety of beasts to assist him in combat.

specs.name: Marksmanship
specs.description: A master archer or sharpshooter who excels in bringing down enemies from afar.

specs.name: Survival
specs.description: A rugged tracker who favors using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.

spell.name: Nightstalker
spell.description: While stealthed, you move 20% faster and your abilities deal 50% more damage.

spell.name: Subterfuge
spell.description: Your abilities requiring Stealth can still be used for 3 sec after Stealth breaks.

spell.name: Shadow Focus
spell.description: Abilities cost 75% less Energy while you are stealthed.

spell.name: Deadly Throw
spell.description:
Finishing move that deals damage, reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec, and interrupts spellcasting when used with 5 combo pioints:

   1 point  : 609 damage

   2 points: 1,218 damage

   3 points: 1,827 damage

   4 points: 2,436 damage

   5 points: 3,045 damage

spell.name: Nerve Strike
spell.description: Kidney Shot and Cheap Shot also reduce damage dealt by the target by up to 50% and healing done by the target by 10% for 6 sec after their effect fades.

spell.name: Combat Readiness
spell.description: Enter a state of heightened defensive awareness. Each successive weapon attack will deal 10% less damage, stacking 5 times.  Lasts 20 sec or until not attacked with weapons for 10 sec.

spell.name: Cheat Death
spell.description: Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health.  For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage.  Cannot trigger more often than once per 90 seconds.

spell.name: Leeching Poison
spell.description: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour.  Your melee attacks have a 50% chance to poison the target for 12 sec, causing subsequent melee attacks to heal you for 15% of damage dealt.

spell.name: Elusiveness
spell.description: Feint also reduces all damage you take by 30% for 5 sec.

spell.name: Cloak and Dagger
spell.description: Ambush, Garrote, and Cheap Shot have a 40 yard range, and cause you to teleport behind your target.

spell.name: Shadowstep
spell.description: Step through the shadows to appear behind your target and gain 70% movement speed for 2 sec.

spell.name: Burst of Speed
spell.description: Increases your movement speed by 70% for 4 sec and removes movement slowing effects. Usable while stealthed.

spell.name: Prey on the Weak
spell.description: Enemies disabled with your Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Gouge, Sap, or Blind take 10% increased damage from all sources.

spell.name: Internal Bleeding
spell.description: Your Kidney Shot also causes the target to bleed for 3,738 damage per combo point over 12 sec.

spell.name: Dirty Tricks
spell.description: Gouge and Blind no longer cost Energy, and no longer break from your Poison and Bleed damage.

spell.name: Shuriken Toss
spell.description:
A ranged attack dealing 3,609 Physical damage to an enemy target. If the enemy is farther than 10 yards away, your autoattacks gain a 30 yard range for 10 sec. Awards 1 combo point. 



Replaces Throw.

spell.name: Marked for Death
spell.description: Mark the target, instantly generating 5 combo points.  Cooldown reset if the target dies within 1 min.

spell.name: Anticipation
spell.description:
When one of your attacks generates a combo point while you already have 5 combo points, you gain an Anticipation charge.



Performing an offensive finishing move consumes all Anticipation charges and grants you a combo point for each.

spell.name: Venom Rush
spell.description:
Increases your maximum energy by 15.



Increases your energy regeneration rate by 5% for every enemy you have poisoned, up to 3.

spell.name: Shadow Reflection
spell.description: Summon a shadow of yourself on the target that will watch you and memorize your offensive ability usage for the next 8 sec. After this time, it will mimic the memorized abilities on its target over the next 8 sec.

spell.name: Death from Above
spell.description:
Finishing move that consumes combo points on the target to empower your weapons with shadow energy and perform a devastating two-part attack. 



You whirl around, dealing up to 4,010 damage to all enemies within 8 yds, then leap into the air and Eviscerate your target on the way back down, with such force that it deals an additional 50% damage.

specs.name: Assassination
specs.description: A deadly master of poisons who dispatches victims with vicious dagger strikes.

specs.name: Combat
specs.description: A swashbuckler who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

specs.name: Subtlety
specs.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush his unsuspecting prey.

spell.name: Desperate Prayer
spell.description: Heals the caster for 22% of maximum health.

spell.name: Spectral Guise
spell.description: Your shadow blurs into the darkness, leaving your true form behind. As a shadow you are stealthed, but remain in combat. Lasts 6 sec or until your true form is hit by 3 direct attacks.

spell.name: Angelic Bulwark
spell.description: When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

spell.name: Body and Soul
spell.description: Your Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith also increase your target's movement speed by 60% for 4 sec.

spell.name: Angelic Feather
spell.description: Place a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 60% increased movement speed for 6 sec.  Max 3 charges. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.

spell.name: Phantasm
spell.description: Activating Fade removes all movement impairing effects and prevents your movement speed from being reduced for 5 sec.

spell.name: Surge of Light
spell.description: Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

spell.name: Surge of Darkness
spell.description: Your Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague damage has a 10% chance to cause your next Mind Spike not to consume your damage over time effects, be instant, and deal 50% additional damage. Can accumulate up to 3 charges.

spell.name: Surge of Light
spell.description: Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

spell.name: Mindbender
spell.description:
Creates a Mindbender to attack the target. Caster receives 0.75% mana when the Mindbender attacks. Lasts 15 sec.



Replaces Shadowfiend.

spell.name: Power Word: Solace
spell.description:
Strike an enemy with heavenly power, dealing 6,334 Holy damage, an additional 693 Holy damage over 9 sec, and restoring 2% of maximum mana. This damage will heal a nearby injured ally for 100% of the damage dealt, or half as much if it heals the Priest.



Replaces Holy Fire.

spell.name: Insanity
spell.description: Consuming Shadow Orbs transforms your Mind Flay into Insanity for 1.92 sec per Shadow Orb consumed. Insanity deals 100% additional damage.

spell.name: Power Word: Solace
spell.description:
Strike an enemy with heavenly power, dealing 6,334 Holy damage, an additional 693 Holy damage over 9 sec, and restoring 2% of maximum mana. This damage will heal a nearby injured ally for 100% of the damage dealt, or half as much if it heals the Priest.



Replaces Holy Fire.

spell.name: Void Tendrils
spell.description: Summons shadowy tendrils, rooting up to 5 enemy targets within 8 yards for 20 sec or until the tendril is killed.

spell.name: Psychic Scream
spell.description: The caster lets out a psychic scream, causing 5 enemies within 8 yards to flee, disorienting them for 8 sec.  Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

spell.name: Dominate Mind
spell.description: Controls a mind up to level 103 for 30 sec.  Does not work versus Mechanical beings. This spell shares diminishing returns with other incapacitating effects.

spell.name: Twist of Fate
spell.description: After healing a target below 35% health, you deal 15% increased damage and healing for 10 sec.

spell.name: Power Infusion
spell.description: Infuses the Priest with power for 20 sec, increasing haste by 25% and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%.

spell.name: Divine Insight
spell.description: Your Heal and Prayer of Healing have a 40% chance to make your next Prayer of Mending not trigger its cooldown and jump to each target instantly.

spell.name: Spirit Shell
spell.description: For the next 10 sec, your Heal, Flash Heal, and Prayer of Healing no longer heal but instead create absorption shields that last 15 sec.

spell.name: Shadowy Insight
spell.description: Your Shadow Word: Pain damage over time and Mind Spike damage has a 5% chance to reset the cooldown on Mind Blast and make your next Mind Blast instant.

spell.name: Cascade
spell.description: Launch a Holy bolt that grows in power with distance, healing an ally for up to 2,866, and then bouncing to additional allies 4 times.  Each time it bounces, it splits into 2 bolts, never healing the same target twice.

spell.name: Cascade
spell.description: Launch a Shadowy bolt that grows in power with distance, damaging an enemy for up to 6,337, and then bouncing to additional enemies 4 times.  Each time it bounces, it splits into 2 bolts, never damaging the same target twice.

spell.name: Divine Star
spell.description: Fire a Divine Star forward 24 yds, damaging enemies in its path for 1,573. After reaching its destination, the Divine Star returns to you, damaging enemies in its path again.

spell.name: Divine Star
spell.description: Fire a Divine Star forward 24 yds, healing allies in its path for 1,957. After reaching its destination, the Divine Star returns to you, healing allies in its path again.

spell.name: Halo
spell.description: Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands and grows in power, up to 30 yds away. Deals up to 11,266 Shadow damage to enemies, with the greatest effect at 25 yds.

spell.name: Halo
spell.description: Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands and grows in power, up to 30 yds away. Heals allies for up to 9,919, with the greatest effect at 25 yds.

spell.name: Clarity of Power
spell.description: Your Mind Spike, Mind Sear, and Shadow Word: Death deal 40% additional damage to targets not affected by your Shadow Word: Pain or Vampiric Touch. Also reduces the cooldown on Mind Blast by 3 sec and makes it instant cast.

spell.name: Clarity of Purpose
spell.description:
Heals an ally for 3,453, increased by up to 100%, based on how injured the target is.



Also heals up to 5 injured allies within 10 yards of the target for the same amount.



Replaces Prayer of Healing.

spell.name: Clarity of Will
spell.description: Shields the target with a protective ward, absorbing 22,539 damage within 20 sec.

spell.name: Void Entropy
spell.description:
Consumes 3 Shadow Orbs to deal 27,195 Shadow damage over 1 min.



Devouring Plague will refresh this effect to its full 1 min duration.

spell.name: Words of Mending
spell.description: Your healing and shielding spell casts grant you a stack of Word of Mending. When you gain 10 stacks of Word of Mending, your next targeted healing or shielding spell also casts a Prayer of Mending at them.

spell.name: Auspicious Spirits
spell.description: Your Shadowy Apparitions grant you 1 Shadow Orb instead of dealing damage.

spell.name: Saving Grace
spell.description: Heals a friendly target for 21,746. Reduces your absorbs and healing done by 10% for 8 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

specs.name: Discipline
specs.description: Uses magic to shield allies from taking damage as well as heal their wounds.

specs.name: Holy
specs.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

specs.name: Shadow
specs.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Army of the Dead

spell.name: Plaguebearer
spell.description: Death Coil and Frost Strike also infect your target, adding 4 sec to the duration of Frost Fever and Blood Plague, and adding an additional stack to Necrotic Plague.

spell.name: Plague Leech
spell.description: Consumes your Blood Plague and Frost Fever on the target to activate up to two random fully-depleted runes as Death Runes.

spell.name: Unholy Blight
spell.description: Surrounds the Death Knight with a vile swarm of unholy insects for 10 sec, stinging all enemies within 10 yards, infecting them with Blood Plague and Frost Fever.

spell.name: Lichborne
spell.description: Draw upon unholy energy to increase Leech by 10%, and make you immune to Charm, Fear, and Sleep for 10 sec.

spell.name: Anti-Magic Zone
spell.description: Places an Anti-Magic Zone for 3 sec that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%.

spell.name: Purgatory
spell.description:
An unholy pact that prevents death when you sustain fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the amount of damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.



If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 3 min.

spell.name: Death's Advance
spell.description:
You passively move 10% faster, and movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 70% of normal movement speed.



When activated, you gain 30% movement speed and may not be slowed below 100% of normal movement speed for 6 seconds.

spell.name: Chilblains
spell.description: Victims of your Frost Fever are Chilled, reducing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec, and victims of your Chains of Ice are immobilized for 3 sec.

spell.name: Asphyxiate
spell.description:
Lifts an enemy target off the ground and crushes their throat with dark energy, stunning them for 5 sec.  Functions as a silence if the target is immune to stuns.



Replaces Strangulate.

spell.name: Blood Tap
spell.description:
Every 15 Runic Power you spend will generate a Blood Charge. Max 12 charges.



Blood Tap consumes 5 Blood Charges to activate a random fully-depleted rune as a Death Rune.

spell.name: Runic Empowerment
spell.description: When you spend Runic Power, you have a 1.50% chance per Runic Power spent to activate a random fully-depleted rune.

spell.name: Runic Corruption
spell.description: When you spend Runic Power, you have a 1.50% chance per Runic Power spent to increase your rune regeneration rate by 100% for 3 sec.

spell.name: Death Pact
spell.description: Heals the Death Knight for 50% of max health, and absorbs incoming healing equal to 25% of max health for 15 sec.

spell.name: Death Siphon
spell.description: Deals 1,810 Shadowfrost damage to an enemy, healing the Death Knight for 335% of damage dealt.

spell.name: Conversion
spell.description: Converts Runic Power to health, restoring 2% of maximum health per 1 sec. Lasts until cancelled or Runic Power is exhausted.

spell.name: Gorefiend's Grasp
spell.description: Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 20 yards of a target (hostile or friendly), pulling them to the target's location.

spell.name: Remorseless Winter
spell.description: Surrounds the Death Knight with a swirling tempest of frigid air for 8 sec, chilling enemies within 8 yards every 1 sec. Each pulse reduces targets' movement speed by 15% for 3 sec, stacking up to 5 times. Upon receiving a fifth application, an enemy will be stunned for 6 sec.

spell.name: Desecrated Ground
spell.description: Corrupts the ground in a 8 yard radius beneath the Death Knight for 10 sec. While standing in this corruption, the Death Knight is immune to roots, snares, and effects that cause loss of control. This ability instantly removes such effects when activated.

spell.name: Necrotic Plague
spell.description:
A powerful disease that deals 69 Shadowfrost damage per stack every 2 sec for 30 sec. Each time it deals damage, it gains 1 stack, and infects another nearby enemy within 8 yards if possible. 



You gain 2 Runic Power whenever a target infected with Necrotic Plague attempts to attack you.



Replaces Blood Plague and Frost Fever, and is applied by any ability which applied either. This effect cannot be refreshed; it gains 1 stack instead.

spell.name: Defile
spell.description:
Defiles the ground targeted by the Death Knight. Every 1 sec, if there are any enemies standing in the Defile, it deals 828 Shadowfrost damage to them, and grows in radius and damage by 2.5%. 



Enemies standing in your Defile deal 10% less damage to you.



Replaces Death and Decay.

spell.name: Breath of Sindragosa
spell.description:
Continuously deals 3,008 Shadowfrost damage every 1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you within 12 yards, and affects them with Mark of Sindragosa for 6 sec. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets. You will continue breathing until cancelled or Runic Power is exhausted.



Mark of Sindragosa causes you to be healed for 10% of spell damage dealt by afflicted enemies.

specs.name: Blood
specs.description: A dark guardian who manipulates and corrupts life energy to sustain himself in the face of an enemy onslaught.

specs.name: Frost
specs.description: An icy harbinger of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes.

specs.name: Unholy
specs.description: A master of death and decay, spreading infection and controlling undead minions to do his bidding.

spell.name: Nature's Guardian
spell.description: Attacks that bring your health below 30% increase your maximum health by 25% for 10 sec, and reduce your threat toward the attacker.  Cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.

spell.name: Stone Bulwark Totem
spell.description: Summons an Earth Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 30 sec, granting the caster a shield absorbing 11,952 damage for 10 sec, and up to an additional 2,988 every 5 sec.

spell.name: Astral Shift
spell.description: Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 6 sec.

spell.name: Frozen Power
spell.description: Your Frost Shock now also roots the target in ice for 5 sec.

spell.name: Earthgrab Totem
spell.description:
Summons an Earth Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 20 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 10 yards for 5 sec.  Enemies previously rooted by the totem will instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.



Replaces Earthbind Totem.

spell.name: Windwalk Totem
spell.description: Summons an Air Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 6 sec, granting raid members within 40 yards immunity to movement-impairing effects.

spell.name: Call of the Elements
spell.description: Resets the cooldown on all totems with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.

spell.name: Totemic Persistence
spell.description: Summoning a second totem of the same element no longer causes the first totem to be destroyed.  May only have one extra totem at a time, and may not be a Fire totem.

spell.name: Totemic Projection
spell.description: Relocates your active totems to the specified location.

spell.name: Elemental Mastery
spell.description: Elemental forces empower you with 30% haste for 20 sec.

spell.name: Ancestral Swiftness
spell.description: Increases haste by 5% and attack speed by 5% at all times.  When activated, your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes instant.

spell.name: Echo of the Elements
spell.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cause your next short cooldown spell or ability not to incur its cooldown.

spell.name: Rushing Streams
spell.description: Your Healing Stream Totem now heals two targets at once for 15% additional healing.

spell.name: Ancestral Guidance
spell.description: For the next 10 sec, 20% of your direct damage and healing is converted to healing on up to 3 nearby injured party or raid members.

spell.name: Conductivity
spell.description: Your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Earth Shock, and Stormstrike increase the duration of your Healing Rain by 3.83 sec, up to a maximum increase of 30 sec.

spell.name: Unleashed Fury
spell.description:
Empowers your Unleash Elements, 

increasing damage taken by the target from your Lightning Bolt by 30% for 10 sec, and increasing your multistrike chance by 5% for 8 sec.

spell.name: Unleashed Fury
spell.description:
Empowers your Unleash Flame,

causing it to also increase damage done with Lightning Bolt by 30% and with Lava Burst by 10% for 10 sec.

spell.name: Unleashed Fury
spell.description: Empowers your Unleash Life, increasing the healing from your next single-target heal on that ally by 50%.

spell.name: Primal Elementalist
spell.description: Your Earth, Storm and Fire Elemental Totems draw forth primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and acting directly under your control.

spell.name: Elemental Blast
spell.description: Harness the raw power of the elements, dealing 5,005 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Multistrike by 500 for 8 sec.

spell.name: Elemental Fusion
spell.description: Your Lava Burst and Lava Lash increase the damage of your next Shock by 40%, stacking up to 2 times.

spell.name: Cloudburst Totem
spell.description:
Summons a Water Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 15 sec that collects power from all healing spells and their multistrikes.



When the Cloudburst Totem is destroyed, replaced, or expires, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 40 yards for a total of 20% of all healing done while it was active, split evenly between them.

spell.name: Storm Elemental Totem
spell.description: Summons an Air Totem with 26,352 health at the feet of the caster, calling forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at the caster's enemies. Each gust of wind does damage to the enemy, and then heals all allies within 15 yards for 100% of the damage dealt, split evenly. Lasts 1 min.

spell.name: Liquid Magma
spell.description: Empowers your current Fire totem with the power of lava, causing liquid magma to erupt from it toward random enemies within 40 yards every 0.48 sec for 10 sec. Each glob of liquid magma deals 657 Fire damage to all enemies within 4 yards.

spell.name: High Tide
spell.description: Your Chain Heal also bounces to up to 2 additional targets affected by your Riptide, and no longer diminishes in power with each bounce.

specs.name: Elemental
specs.description: A spellcaster who harnesses the destructive forces of nature and the elements.

specs.name: Enhancement
specs.description: A totemic warrior who strikes foes with weapons imbued with elemental power.

specs.name: Restoration
specs.description: A healer who calls upon ancestral spirits and the cleansing power of water to mend allies' wounds.

spell.name: Evanesce
spell.description:
Fade into the nether, avoiding all attacks against you for 3 sec. Castable while another spell is in progress and unaffected by global cooldown.



Replaces Ice Block.

spell.name: Blazing Speed
spell.description: Suppresses movement slowing effects and increases your movement speed by 150% for 1.50 sec.  Castable while another spell is in progress and unaffected by global cooldown.

spell.name: Ice Floes
spell.description: Your next spell can be cast while moving. Castable while another spell is in progress and unaffected by global cooldown.  Max 3 charges.

spell.name: Alter Time
spell.description: Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec.  Effect negated by long distance or death.

spell.name: Flameglow
spell.description: Protects you with fiery energy, absorbing up to 1,024 damage from each attack against you, up to 30% of each attack.

spell.name: Ice Barrier
spell.description: Instantly shields you for 1 min, absorbing 16,904 damage. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage.

spell.name: Ring of Frost
spell.description: Summons a Ring of Frost for 10 sec at the target location. Enemies entering the ring will become incapacitated for 10 sec.  Limit 10 targets.

spell.name: Ice Ward
spell.description: Protects a friendly target for 30 sec. The next 3 melee attacks will trigger a Frost Nova, freezing all enemies within 10 yds for 5 sec.

spell.name: Frostjaw
spell.description: Silences and freezes the target in place for 8 sec.  Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

spell.name: Greater Invisibility
spell.description:
Instantly makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat and two damage over time effects.  Any action taken cancels this effect.  You take 90% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after the effect expires.



Replaces Invisibility.

spell.name: Cauterize
spell.description: Fatal damage will instead bring you to 35% health and then burn you for 28% of your max health over 6 sec.  This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 min.

spell.name: Cold Snap
spell.description: Immediately resets the cooldown of your Ice Block, and Frost Nova spells, and heals you for 22% of your maximum health.  Usable during most loss of control effects, and unaffected by global cooldown.

spell.name: Frost Bomb
spell.description:
Places a Frost Bomb on the target for 12 sec. Limit 1 target.



Your Ice Lances that benefit from Shatter will trigger the release of a wave of freezing ice, dealing 4,142 Frost damage to the target and 2,589 Frost damage to all other enemies within 10 yards.

spell.name: Nether Tempest
spell.description: Places a Nether Tempest on the target which deals 1,404 Arcane damage over 12 sec to the target and 1,296 to all enemies within 10 yards. Limit 1 target. Damage increased by 50% per Arcane Charge at cast time.

spell.name: Living Bomb
spell.description:
The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking 3,456 Fire damage over 12 sec. When this effect ends, or the target dies, it explodes to deal an additional 2,762 Fire damage to the target and all other enemies within 10 yards.



May be spread by Inferno Blast.

spell.name: Unstable Magic
spell.description: Arcane Blast, Fireball, Frostfire Bolt, and Frostbolt have a 30% chance to explode on impact, dealing an additional 50% damage to the target, and to all other enemies within 8 yards.

spell.name: Blast Wave
spell.description:
Causes an explosion around the target enemy or ally, dealing 6,904 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yards, and reducing movement speed by 70% for 4 sec. A primary enemy target will take 100% increased damage. Max 2 charges.



Replaces Frost Nova.

spell.name: Ice Nova
spell.description:
Causes a whirl of icy wind around the target enemy or ally, dealing 6,904 Frost damage to all enemies within 8 yards, and freezing for 2 sec. A primary enemy target will take 100% increased damage. Max 2 charges.



Replaces Frost Nova.

spell.name: Supernova
spell.description:
Causes a pulse of arcane energy around the target enemy or ally, dealing 6,904 Arcane damage to all enemies within 8 yards, and knocking them upward. A primary enemy target will take 100% increased damage.  Max 2 charges



Replaces Frost Nova.

spell.name: Mirror Image
spell.description: Creates 3 copies of the caster nearby, which cast spells and attack the Mage's enemies. Lasts 40 sec.

spell.name: Rune of Power
spell.description: Places a Rune of Power on the ground for 3 min which increases your spell damage by 15% while you stand within 8 yds.  You may place up to  2 Runes of Power at one time.

spell.name: Incanter's Flow
spell.description: Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 20% increased damage and then diminishing down to 4% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.

spell.name: Kindling
spell.description: Your Fireball, Frostfire Bolt, Pyroblast, and Inferno Blast critical strikes reduce the cooldown remaining on Combustion by 1 sec.

spell.name: Thermal Void
spell.description: Casting Ice Lance extends your Icy Veins by 2 sec.

spell.name: Overpowered
spell.description: Casting Arcane Missiles extends Arcane Power by 2 sec.

spell.name: Prismatic Crystal
spell.description:
Conjures a prismatic crystal at the target location, which is attackable by only the Mage, and takes 30% additional damage. 



When the crystal takes damage, it instantly releases a burst of energy dealing that damage, split evenly between all enemies within 8 yards.

spell.name: Meteor
spell.description: Calls down a meteor which lands at the target location after 3 sec, dealing 12,944 Fire damage, split evenly between all targets within 8 yards. Also burns the ground, dealing an additional 1,035 Fire damage every 1 sec for 8 sec to enemies in the area.

spell.name: Arcane Orb
spell.description: Launches an Arcane Orb forward from the Mage's position, traveling up to 40 yards, dealing 2,330 Arcane damage to enemies it passes through. Grants the Mage an Arcane Charge when cast and every time it deals damage.

spell.name: Comet Storm
spell.description: Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, each of which does 1,425 Frost damage, split between all enemies within 4 yards of its impact point.

specs.name: Arcane
specs.description: Manipulate the arcane, destroying enemies with overwhelming power.

specs.name: Fire
specs.description: Ignite enemies with balls of fire and combustive flames.

specs.name: Frost
specs.description: Freezes enemies in their tracks and shatters them with Frost magic.

spell.name: Dark Regeneration
spell.description: Restores 20% of maximum health over 12 sec to you and your pet, and increases all healing received by 25% for the duration.

spell.name: Soul Leech
spell.description: Shadow Bolt, Soul Fire, Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, Touch of Chaos, Incinerate, Haunt, and Drain Soul grant you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb a percentage of the damage they dealt for 15 sec.

spell.name: Harvest Life
spell.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and 100% more healing.

spell.name: Searing Flames
spell.description: Ember Tap causes 50% more healing, and refunds 50% of its Burning Ember cost.

spell.name: Howl of Terror
spell.description:
Your howl causes 5 enemies within 10 yds to flee in fear, disorienting them for 20 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.



Being hit by a damaging attack reduces your cooldown on Howl of Terror by 1 sec.

spell.name: Mortal Coil
spell.description: Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating them for 3 sec, and restores 11% of the caster's maximum health.

spell.name: Shadowfury
spell.description: Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.

spell.name: Soul Link
spell.description: 20% of all damage taken is split with your demon pet, and 3% of damage you deal heals you and your demon.

spell.name: Sacrificial Pact
spell.description: Sacrifices 20% of your demon's current health to shield you for 400% of the sacrificed health for 20 sec. If you have no demon, your health is sacrificed instead. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.

spell.name: Dark Bargain
spell.description: Prevents all damage for 8 sec, but when the effect ends, you take  50% of the damage prevented over 8 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.

spell.name: Blood Horror
spell.description: While active, any time an enemy melee attack deals damage to the Warlock, the enemy will run in horror, incapacitated for up to 4 sec. 1 charge. Blood Horror lasts 1 min.

spell.name: Burning Rush
spell.description: Iincrease your movement speed by 50%, but also deals damage to you equal to 4% of your maximum health per second. Movement-impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until cancelled.

spell.name: Unbound Will
spell.description: Purges all Magic effects, movement impairing effects, and loss of control effects from yourself and your demon.

spell.name: Grimoire of Supremacy
spell.description:
You command stronger demons, replacing your normal minions. These demons deal 20% additional damage and have more powerful abilities. 



Spells Learned:

 Summon Fel Imp

 Summon Voidlord

 Summon Shivarra

 Summon Observer 

 Summon Abyssal

 Summon Terrorguard

spell.name: Grimoire of Service
spell.description:
Instantly summon a second demon which fights for 20 sec. The demon will instantly use one of its special abilities when summoned:



 Grimoire: Imp: Cleanses a harmful magic effect from its master.

 Grimoire: Voidwalker Taunts its target.

 Grimoire: Succubus Seduces its target.

 Grimoire: Felhunter Interrupts its target.

spell.name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
spell.description:
Sacrifice your demon to gain one of its abilities, and to increase the damage of your Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, and Shadowburn by 20%. Does not apply to spells affected by Fire and Brimstone.



Also causes you to regenerate 2% of maximum health every 8 sec.



Lasts 1 hour or until you summon a demon.

spell.name: Grimoire of Synergy
spell.description: When you or your demon deal damage, there is a chance to trigger Demonic Synergy, granting the other one 15% increased damage for 15 sec.

spell.name: Archimonde's Darkness
spell.description: Dark Soul now has 2 charges.

spell.name: Kil'jaeden's Cunning
spell.description: The cunning of Kil'jaeden allows you to move while casting Warlock spells for 8 sec. Castable while casting other spells.

spell.name: Mannoroth's Fury
spell.description: Increases the area of effect by 500% and damage by 100% of Seed of Corruption, Hellfire, Immolation Aura, and Rain of Fire for 10 sec.

spell.name: Demonbolt
spell.description:
Launch of ball of demonic energy at the target, dealing 14,239 Chaos damage.



Each Demonbolt amplifies further Demonbolts, increasing damage by 20% and cost by 100% for 40 sec (reduced by Haste), stacking up to 10 times.

spell.name: Soulburn: Haunt
spell.description:
Grants the Soulburn empowerment to your Haunt spell.



Your Haunt spell also increases the damage of your damage over time effects to all targets by 20% for 30 sec.

spell.name: Charred Remains
spell.description: Incinerate and Conflagrate deal 60% less damage but generate 200% more Burning Embers. Fire and Brimstone can now also affect Chaos Bolt.

spell.name: Cataclysm
spell.description: Conjures a cataclysm at the target location, dealing 25,886 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards, and applying Agony, Corruption, or Immolate.

spell.name: Demonic Servitude
spell.description: You are now able to maintain your control over even greater demons indefinitely, allowing you to summon Doomguards and Infernals as permanent pets.

specs.name: Affliction
specs.description: A master of shadow magic who specializes in drains and damage-over-time spells.

specs.name: Demonology
specs.description: A master of demonic magic who transforms into a demon and compels demonic powers to aid him.

specs.name: Destruction
specs.description: A master of chaos who calls down fire to burn and demolish enemies.

glyphs.name: Glyph of Leer of the Ox

spell.name: Celerity
spell.description: Reduces the cooldown of Roll and Chi Torpedo by 5 sec and increases their maximum number of charges by 1.

spell.name: Tiger's Lust
spell.description: Increases movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.

spell.name: Momentum
spell.description: Roll and Chi Torpedo also increase movement speed by 25% for 10 sec, stacking up to 2 times.

spell.name: Chi Wave
spell.description: A wave of Chi energy to flows through friends and foes, dealing 1,488 Nature damage or 1,488 healing.  Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.

spell.name: Zen Sphere
spell.description:
Forms a Zen Sphere above the target, healing the target for 5,699 over 16 sec and dealing 244 Nature damage every 2 sec to the nearest enemy within 10 yards.



After 16 sec, the Zen Sphere detonates, dealing 996 Nature damage and 633 healing to all targets within 10 yards.  Triggered early if dispelled or the target is damaged below 35% health.

spell.name: Chi Burst
spell.description: Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 5,508 Nature damage to all enemies, and 2,705 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path.

spell.name: Power Strikes
spell.description: Every 15 sec, your next Jab, Spinning Crane Kick, Expel Harm, or Crackling Jade Lightning generates 1 additional Chi, or a Chi Sphere if already at maximum Chi.

spell.name: Ascension
spell.description: Increases your maximum Chi by 1, your Energy regeneration by 15%, and your maximum mana by 20%.

spell.name: Chi Brew
spell.description: Instantly restores 2 Chi, and generates 1 stack of Mana Tea. Maximum 2 charges.

spell.name: Ring of Peace
spell.description: Form a Ring of Peace around the friendly target for 8 sec, incapacitating all enemies for 3 sec, and incapacitating other enemies the first time they use a harmful spell or ability.

spell.name: Charging Ox Wave
spell.description: A mighty Ox effigy rushes forward 30 yards, stunning all enemies in its path for 3 sec.

spell.name: Leg Sweep
spell.description: Knocks down all enemies within 5 yards, stunning them for 5 sec.

spell.name: Healing Elixirs
spell.description: Heals you for 15% of your maximum health when a damaging attack brings you below 35% health, or when you drink a Brew or Tea while injured.  This effect can only happen once every 18 sec.

spell.name: Dampen Harm
spell.description: Reduces damage by 50% from the next 3 attacks that damage you for 15% or more of your maximum health.  Castable while stunned.

spell.name: Diffuse Magic
spell.description: Reduces magic damage taken by 90% for 6 sec and transfers all harmful magical effects back to their original caster if possible.

spell.name: Rushing Jade Wind
spell.description:
Summon a whirling tornado around you, causing 4,591 damage over 5.75 sec to enemies within 8 yards. Generates 1 Chi if it hits at least 3 targets.



Replaces Spinning Crane Kick.

spell.name: Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger
spell.description: Summon an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 45 sec under your command.  Xuen attacks your primary target and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 1 sec with Tiger Lightning for 2,004 Nature damage.

spell.name: Chi Torpedo
spell.description:
Torpedo forward, dealing 3,009 Nature damage to all enemies and 3,185 healing to all allies in your path.



Replaces Roll, and travels farther.

spell.name: Hurricane Strike
spell.description: Unleash a rapid series of kicks toward random enemies within 12 yards, dealing a total of 25,478 to 25,538 damage over 2 sec. While kicking, you are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects.

spell.name: Breath of the Serpent
spell.description: Your Jade Serpent Statue breathes healing mists toward you, healing allies in a cone within 20 yards for 1,036 every 1 sec, for 10 sec.

spell.name: Soul Dance
spell.description: You are now able to shrug off even spells, such that 30% of your normal stagger amount works against magic damage.

spell.name: Chi Explosion
spell.description:
Consumes up to 4 Chi to cause the target to explode with Chi energy, causing additional effects based on Chi consumed:



1+ Chi: Heals an ally for 4,195 plus 4,195 per Chi consumed.

2+ Chi: Causes an additional 50% healing over 6 sec.

3+ Chi: This healing is evenly divided among all allies within 8 yards of the target.

4   Chi: Also summons 8 Healing Spheres in an 8 yard radius ring around the target that last 15 sec.



Replaces Blackout Kick. Chi Explosion is Instant and provides different effects while in Stance of the Spirited Crane.

spell.name: Chi Explosion
spell.description:
Consumes up to 4 Chi to cause the target to explode with Chi energy, causing additional effects based on Chi consumed:



1+ Chi: Deals Nature damage to an enemy equal to 1,505 plus 1,505 per Chi consumed.

2+ Chi: Deals an additional 50% damage over 6 sec.

3+ Chi: Also generates a charge of Tigereye Brew.

4   Chi: The damage also hits all enemies within 8 yards of the target.



Replaces Blackout Kick. Combo Breaker: Blackout Kick is also replaced with Combo Breaker: Chi Explosion, which causes your next Chi Explosion to refund 2 Chi.

spell.name: Chi Explosion
spell.description:
Consumes up to 4 Chi to cause the target to explode with Chi energy, causing additional effects based on Chi consumed:



1+ Chi: Deals Nature damage to an enemy equal to 2,257 plus 2,257 per Chi consumed.

2+ Chi: You also gain Shuffle for 2 sec plus 2 sec per Chi consumed.

3+ Chi: Also purifies all of your staggered damage.

4   Chi: The damage also hits all enemies within 8 yards of the target.



Replaces Blackout Kick.

spell.name: Pool of Mists
spell.description:
Your Renewing Mist spell now has 3 charges and its healing is increased by 15%.



Your Rising Sun Kick spell now has 3 charges and its damage is increased by 50%.

spell.name: Serenity
spell.description: You enter an elevated state of mental and physical serenity for 10 sec. While in this state, all Chi consumptions are instantly refilled.

specs.name: Brewmaster
specs.description: A sturdy brawler who uses liquid fortification and unpredictable movement to avoid damage and protect allies.

specs.name: Mistweaver
specs.description: A healer who mixes traditional herbal medicine with Pandaren martial arts.

specs.name: Windwalker
specs.description: A martial artist without peer who pummels foes with hands and fists.

spell.name: Feline Swiftness
spell.description: Increases your movement speed by 15%.

spell.name: Displacer Beast
spell.description: Teleports the Druid up to 20 yards forward, activates Cat Form, and increases movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.

spell.name: Wild Charge
spell.description: Fly to a nearby ally's position.

spell.name: Ysera's Gift
spell.description: Heals you for 4% of your maximum health every 5 sec.  If you are at full health, a random nearby injured ally will be healed instead.

spell.name: Renewal
spell.description: Instantly heals the Druid for 22% of maximum health.  Usable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Cenarion Ward
spell.description: Protects a friendly target for 30 sec.  Any damage taken will consume the ward and heal the target for 30,369 over 6 sec.

spell.name: Faerie Swarm
spell.description: Prevents the target from activating stealth or invisibility, and reduces movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.  Deals 987 damage when cast from Bear Form. Usable in all shapeshift forms, but incurs a 6 sec cooldown while in Bear Form or Cat Form.

spell.name: Faerie Swarm
spell.description: Prevents the target from activating stealth or invisibility, and reduces movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.  Deals 987 damage when cast from Bear Form. Usable in all shapeshift forms, but incurs a 6 sec cooldown while in Bear Form or Cat Form.

spell.name: Faerie Swarm
spell.description:
Grants an improved version of Faerie Fire that also reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.



This talent replaces Faerie Fire.

spell.name: Faerie Swarm
spell.description:
Grants an improved version of Faerie Fire that also reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.



This talent replaces Faerie Fire.

spell.name: Mass Entanglement
spell.description: Roots your target in place for 20 sec and spreads to additional nearby enemies. Damage caused may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Typhoon
spell.description: Summons a violent Typhoon that strikes targets in front of the caster within 15 yards, knocking them back and dazing them for 6 sec.  Usable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Soul of the Forest
spell.description: Increases the damage bonus from Lunar and Solar Empowerment by an additional 15%.

spell.name: Soul of the Forest
spell.description:
When you cast Swiftmend, you gain Soul of the Forest. 



Soul of the Forest reduces the cast time of your next Healing Touch by 50%, or increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 100%, or increases the healing of your next Wild Growth by 50%.

spell.name: Soul of the Forest
spell.description: Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 15% more damage.

spell.name: Soul of the Forest
spell.description: Your finishing moves grant 4 Energy per combo point.

spell.name: Incarnation: Chosen of Elune
spell.description:
An improved Moonkin Form that increases all your spell damage by an additional 15%.  Lasts 30 sec.



You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

spell.name: Incarnation: Tree of Life
spell.description:
Shapeshift into the Tree of Life, increasing healing done by 15%, increasing armor by 120%, and granting immunity to Polymorph.  Functionality of Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Entangling Roots is enhanced.



You may freely shapeshift in and out of this form for 30 sec, at which point the shapeshift expires.

spell.name: Incarnation: Son of Ursoc
spell.description:
An improved Bear Form that reduces the cooldown on all melee damage abilities and Growl to 1.5 sec.  Lasts 30 sec.



You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.

spell.name: Incarnation: King of the Jungle
spell.description:
An improved Cat Form that allows the use of Prowl while in combat and causes Shred and Rake to function as if stealth were active.  Lasts 30 sec.



You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Cat Form for its duration.

spell.name: Force of Nature
spell.description: Summons a Treant which will immediately taunt your current target, and will melee for 102 Physical damage every 2 sec.  Lasts 15 sec.  Maximum 3 charges.

spell.name: Force of Nature
spell.description: Summons a Treant which will immediately root your current target for 30 sec.  The Treant will cast Wrath at that target for 647 Nature damage every 2 sec.  Lasts 15 sec.  Maximum 3 charges.

spell.name: Force of Nature
spell.description: Summons a Treant which will immediately root your current target for 30 sec, and will melee for 567 Physical damage every 2 sec.  Lasts 15 sec.  Maximum 3 charges.

spell.name: Force of Nature
spell.description: Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target.  The Treant will cast Healing Touch on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 5,649.  Lasts 15 sec.  Maximum 3 charges.

spell.name: Incapacitating Roar
spell.description: Invokes the spirit of Ursol to roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Any damage caused will remove the effect.  Usable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Ursol's Vortex
spell.description: Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination location that reduces the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%.  The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center.  Usable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Mighty Bash
spell.description: Invokes the spirit of Ursoc to stun the target for 5 sec.  Usable in all shapeshift forms.

spell.name: Heart of the Wild
spell.description: When activated, dramatically improves the Druid's ability to tank, cast spells, and heal for 45 sec.

spell.name: Heart of the Wild
spell.description: When activated, dramatically improves the Druid's ability to tank, deal melee damage, and heal.

spell.name: Heart of the Wild
spell.description: When activated, dramatically improves the Druid's ability to deal melee damage in Cat Form, cast spells, and heal.

spell.name: Heart of the Wild
spell.description: When activated, increases all healing done by 35% and dramatically improves the Druid's ability to tank, deal melee damage, and cast spells.

spell.name: Dream of Cenarius
spell.description: Increases healing from Healing Touch and Rejuvenation by 20%.  Your Healing Touch and Rejuvenation also heal you when used to heal someone else.

spell.name: Dream of Cenarius
spell.description: Increases Wrath damage by 20% and your Wrath spell causes a nearby ally to be healed for 150% of the damage done.

spell.name: Dream of Cenarius
spell.description: Increases healing from Healing Touch by 20%, increases the critical strike chance of Mangle by 10%, and your Mangle critical strikes have a 40% chance to make your next Healing Touch or Rebirth instant, free, and castable in all forms, and to benefit from Attack Power instead of Spell Power.

spell.name: Dream of Cenarius
spell.description: Lunar Peak and Solar Peak also cause your Moonfire and Sunfire to heal an injured ally for 10,356.

spell.name: Nature's Vigil
spell.description: While active, all single-target healing and damage spells and abilities also heal a nearby friendly target based on the amount done, 20% for heals, 40% for damage spells.

spell.name: Guardian of Elune
spell.description:
Savage Defense now lasts 3 sec, and increases your chance to dodge by 100%.



Additionally, the recharge time on Savage Defense is now reduced by your base dodge chance percentage.

spell.name: Euphoria
spell.description: You feel a deeper connection to the stars, reducing your Balance Energy cycle time by 50%. Additionally, your Lunar and Solar Empowerments also reduce the cast time of the affected spells by 20%.

spell.name: Lunar Inspiration
spell.description: Moonfire is now usable while in Cat Form, generates 1 combo point, deals damage based on attack power, and costs 30 energy.

spell.name: Moment of Clarity
spell.description: Omen of Clarity now lasts 5 sec, instead of 1 cast.

spell.name: Germination
spell.description:
You can apply two Rejuvenations to the same target.



Rejuvenation's duration is also increased by 3 sec.

spell.name: Pulverize
spell.description: A devastating blow that consumes 3 stacks of your Lacerate on the target to deal 12,582 Physical damage, and reduce damage taken by 15% for 12 sec.

spell.name: Bloodtalons
spell.description: Casting Healing Touch causes your next two melee abilities to deal 30% additional damage.

spell.name: Stellar Flare
spell.description: A powerful spell which benefits from both Lunar and Solar Eclipses, dealing the most damage when they are balanced. Burns the target for 1,166 Spellstorm damage, and then an additional 3,890 damage over 20 sec.

spell.name: Bristling Fur
spell.description: You bristle your fur, reducing all damage taken by 40% for 3 sec.

spell.name: Claws of Shirvallah
spell.description:
Renegade Druids have developed the ability to shapeshift into a creature half man and half cat. This alternate Cat Form allows the use of all non-damaging Druid spells while shapeshifted, and increases Versatility by 5%.



Have we learned nothing from the Scythe of Elune?

           --Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

spell.name: Balance of Power
spell.description:
You align to the power of the Moon and Stars so your direct damage spells reenergize your damage over time effects.



Your Starfires extend the duration of Moonfire by 6 sec.

Your Wraths extend the duration of Sunfire by 4 sec.



Also increases the damage over time of your Moonfire and Sunfire by 10%.

spell.name: Rampant Growth
spell.description: Swiftmend now consumes your own Regrowth or Rejuvenation, but has no cooldown.

specs.name: Balance
specs.description: Can take on the form of a powerful Moonkin, balancing the power of Arcane and Nature magic to destroy enemies at a distance.

specs.name: Feral
specs.description: Takes on the form of a great cat to deal damage with bleeds and bites.

specs.name: Guardian
specs.description: Takes on the form of a mighty bear to absorb damage and protect allies.

specs.name: Restoration
specs.description: Uses heal-over-time Nature spells to keep allies alive.
